actions.name: Friend Guard
actions.description: Effect: All allies within range of the user takes 25% less damage from Physical- and Special-Category attacks. The user does not benefit the effect of this Ability, but can get the benefit from another creature with Friend Guard. A creature can only benefit from one instance of Friend Guard at a time.
